document.full_text: veteran british rocker roger daltrey, a vehement critic of tv talent shows, once auditioned to be a judge on "american idol," according to rolling stone magazine.
document.title: "idol" critic roger daltrey wanted to be a judge
lines_and_colors: veteran british rocker roger daltrey, a vehement critic of tv talent shows, once auditioned to be a judge on "american idol," according to rolling stone magazine.
